relevant_findings.general: NAD, slightly uncomfortable from sacral decubitus
relevant_findings.HEENT: No conjunctival injection, anicteric, moist mucous membranes, 3mm pupils that do not react
relevant_findings.gastrointestinal: Bowel sounds positive, soft abdomen, non-tender, non-distended, no guarding or rebound
relevant_findings.skin: Stage III decubitus with central area of necrotic skin, foul odor
relevant_findings.neurological: Face symmetric, speech fluent, bilateral lower extremity weakness; unable to lift feet off bed, good historian, no evidence of delirium
